citeinfo.origin: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Geographic Information Division
citeinfo.title: PennDOT - Pennsylvania Traffic Counts

descript.abstract: Traffic volumes; measured and calculated amounts of vehicle traffic that travel the sections of road.
descript.purpose: Determine traffic volumes on Pennsylvania roads to assist with traffic light placement and speed limit ranges

idinfo.useconst:
The user shall indemnify, save harmless, and, if requested, defend the COMMONWEALTH, their officers, agents, and employees from and against any suits, claims, or actions for injury, death, or property damage arising out of the use of or any defect in the FILES or any accompanying documentation.

cntorgp.cntorg: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Geographic Information Division

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800

attracc.attraccr: Verified visually by comparison against source materials.

dataqual.complete: Contains all officially recognized features within the Commonwealth.

horizpa.horizpar: Digitized from sources conforming to National Mapping Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000 scale maps. Updates and maintenance completed from orthophotography where available.

procstep.procdesc: Digitized into Bentley Microstation system from most recently available 7.5 minute USGS topographic quadrangles on a stable (mylar) base. Updated information is added from orthophotography, construction plans and maps as this information becomes available.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Current annualized average daily truck count
Current annualized average daily truck traffic count
Daily vehicle miles traveled (VMT). VMT = Segment length (in miles) times AADT.
Daily truck vehicle miles traveled (VMT). Truck VMT = Segment length (in miles) times ADTT
